code: 'use strict';const inherits=require('inherits');const DEREncoder=require('./der');function PEMEncoder(entity){DEREncoder.call(this,entity);this.enc='pem';}inherits(PEMEncoder,DEREncoder);module.exports=PEMEncoder;PEMEncoder.prototype.encode=function encode(data,options){const buf=DEREncoder.prototype.encode.call(this,data);const p=buf.toString('base64');const out=['-----BEGIN '+options.label+'-----'];for(let i=0;i<p.length;i+=64)out.push(p.slice(i,i+64));out.push('-----END '+options.label+'-----');return out.join('\n');};
